text: The 91st Assembly District of Wisconsin covers all or part of Pierce, Pepin, Buffalo, Trempealeau and Jackson Counties. It is currently represented by Democrat Jodi Emerson, who was first elected in 2018.https://docs.legis.wisconsin.gov/2019/legislators/assembly/1939 Past Representatives include: * Chris Danou (D) 2009-2013https://ballotpedia.org/Chris_Danou * Barbara Gronemus (D) 1983-2009 * Alan S. Robertson (R) ?-1983 * Steve Gunderson (R) 1975-1981 ==References== Category:Pierce County, Wisconsin Category:Pepin County, Wisconsin Category:Buffalo County, Wisconsin Category:Trempealeau County, Wisconsin Category:Jackson County, Wisconsin Category:Wisconsin State Assembly districts
title: Wisconsin Assembly, District 91
